title: "Face Time With Eight Mayoral Candidates"
excerpt: "This year, the candidates have spent a lot of their time on Zoom. It’s been weird. But the internet — in this case, Skype — is how I last talked with Kathryn Garcia, a wry, thoughtful former sanitation commissioner and candidate for mayor who deserves more attention than she has so far received in the race."
